thread.title: Alderney runway: repairs could be postponed for up to 5 years
thread.title_full: Alderney runway: repairs could be postponed for up to 5 years | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Alderney runway: repairs could be postponed for up to 5 years
text:
Alderney politicians have expressed their frustration at plans to push back repairs on the island's runway.
The strip has been in need of an update since last year, after it was temporarily narrowed.
The surface of the runway is also peeling away, meaning chips of tar have come loose.
The project was set to go ahead before 2017 but in Guernsey's budget for 2016, it is proposed funding should be pushed back until after this time.
Politicians in Alderney, however, say repairs should be a priority.
We need to see it restored to its full width as soon as possible. At the moment you can barely consider it fit for purpose
We are really concerned that this essential doorway into the island could be closed.
â€“ Neil Harvey, Chairman of Alderney's Policy and Finance Committee The budget goes before the Sates for deliberation later this month.
Last updated Thu 8 Oct 2015 Travel Alderney Guernsey
